name: ai-control-by-zk
description: AI Agent with ZKP-based Rule Compliance for Automated Payments

scripts.setup:ptau: cd build && snarkjs powersoftau new bn128 12 pot12_0000.ptau && snarkjs powersoftau contribute pot12_0000.ptau pot12_0001.ptau --name='First contribution' -v && snarkjs powersoftau prepare phase2 pot12_0001.ptau pot12_final.ptau -v
scripts.setup:zkey: cd build && snarkjs groth16 setup payment_rules.r1cs pot12_final.ptau payment_rules_0000.zkey && snarkjs zkey contribute payment_rules_0000.zkey payment_rules_0001.zkey --name='First contribution' -v && snarkjs zkey export verificationkey payment_rules_0001.zkey verification_key.json
scripts.build:prod: npm run build && npm run build:circuits
scripts.postinstall: npm run build:circuits || echo 'Circuit build skipped'
